name: Mac
customerReview: Amazing quality. Ordered gold sequin black abaya for my daughters b'day. Love the beading and customer service. Zara was so helpful and fulfilled all my requests. Best quality of abaya I have ordered online seriously.Will be telling everyone to buy from abayabuth if they want quality and craftsmanship.

name: Domin
customerReview: So happy I absolutely love the quality of the clothing and price point is great,sizing is good and delivered on time. Honestly I can't praise this company enough nothing compares. I ordered two to abbayas to begin with and let's just say I need a big collection now Thank you abayabuth A very happy customer

name: Kno
customerReview: Loved it. This is a dream swim suit for a hijabi. The fact that it comes with a cap is such a relief. Because of this i was able to do fun in my Maldives trip.
